rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MDC4120}
Must be enrolled in course version {F6002}

description: This unit advances the student's knowledge gained in Multimedia Design Studio 1 (MMD4001) and places a strong emphasis on digital experience design. Particular importance is placed on the role of interface design, interactivity, virtual space and storytelling in multimedia design, including the skills and techniques to use these elements across a range of media platforms. Students undertake project work that explores a wide range of design processes, technical skills and conceptual models involved with the production of interactive media. Individual's specialist skills and folio preparation will also be covered.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
